SELECT M.*, NVL(CNT, 0) CNT FROM TBL_MENU M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT M1.MENU_NO, COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBL_MENU M1 INNER JOIN TBL_MENU M2 ON M1.MENU_NO = M2.MENU_PART GROUP BY M1.MENU_NO ) T ON M.MENU_NO = T.MENU_NO
WHERE DEPTH = #{depth}
SELECT * FROM TBL_FOOD F INNER JOIN TBL_FOOD_IMG I ON F.FOOD_NO = I.FOOD_NO INNER JOIN TBL_MENU M ON F.MENU_PART = M.MENU_NO WHERE F.FOOD_NO = #{foodNo}
